articles.title: JetBlue launches hostile takeover bid for Spirit Airlines - CNBC
articles.description: JetBlue wrote to Spirit shareholders Monday, offering $30 a share and encouraging them to vote against the Frontier deal.
articles.content: JetBlue Airways launched a hostile takeover bid for Spirit Airlines, heating up a battle for the discount carrier that rebuffed JetBlue's $3.6 billion offer earlier this month and stuck with an exist… [+5129 chars]
